title: Improving quality of life for people with chronic heart failure

title_detail.value: Improving quality of life for people with chronic heart failure

summary: Patients with chronic heart failure face related problems, such as depression and fatigue, that could be relieved by an expanded model of care, according to a recently published study.

summary_detail.value: Patients with chronic heart failure face related problems, such as depression and fatigue, that could be relieved by an expanded model of care, according to a recently published study.
